nodes.bodyText: Would prefer a positively phrased property and in the infinitive form e.g. loadBalance=true.
sure. the only reason for a negative property name is I wanted to keep the property's value and postgresql.enabled the same.
Add a comment that provides a link to the docs that show why this hack works.

Can remove the last statement as it's unnecessary to say how it is implemented. Would add a blurb about what load balancing means in this context (e.g. it sends all reads to the primary instead of balancing them across the primary and replicas).
